thread.title: The 18th Annual Fleet Week Coronado Speed Festival Starts on September 19

author: cbs8
title: The 18th Annual Fleet Week Coronado Speed Festival Starts on September 19
text:
Fleet Week Coronado Speed Festival
URGENT--MEDIA CREDENTIAL DEADLINE APPROACHING
SAN DIEGO , Sept. 2, 2015 /PRNewswire-USNewswire/ -- The time is now to fill out the forms for your media credential for this year's "Race at the Base," the 18 th Annual Fleet Week Coronado Speed Festival . The media credential application is now available online on the Fleet Week San Diego website under MEDIA .
The deadline for applications is September 4, 2015 . For more details about media credentials, contact Elisabeth Handley at elisabeth@fleetweeksandiego.org or (619) 997-0771.
250 prestigious historic racecars divided into nine different race groups by make, age and horsepower race at high speed on a spectator-friendly 1.7-mile course constructed on the runways of Naval Air Station North Island. Military Pit Crew Challenge – 20+ teams of 10 active-duty sailors and marines timed as they recreate an actual historic stock car pit stop. Event Marque – The Big Boys are back! The hard-fought Trans-AM race series of the late sixties and early seventies is recreated by Historic Trans-AM enthusiasts. Ride & Drive – Test-drive high-performance vehicles from BMW and Jaguar. Navy Open House – Naval Base Coronado is home to over 20,000 active duty military and over 4,000 civilian employees. This is the public's opportunity to climb aboard active Navy ships berthed at NASNI, visit command displays, watch flyovers and see military vehicles in action. Military Displays – A multitude of helicopters, special boats and hovercraft will be on display, with pilots eager to answer questions and show you the craft. Honorary Grand Marshals: "Criminal Minds" star Joe Mantegna -- AND -- WWII veterans in honor of the 70 th Anniversary of the end of the war Red Bull Endurocross Rider – Geoff Aaron , an X Games regular, is making his eighth appearance in Austin 2015 and his first at Fleet Week Coronado Speed Festival! Fast & Furious 7 - The event has been selected as the official launch site of the release of Fast & Furious 7 on DVD. Cars from the movie will be at the event throughout the weekend for attendees to see and interact with, and representatives will be giving away movie merchandise. Open paddock – Allows fans to walk right up to the cars and interact with the drivers and crew. Car club exhibit featuring more than 1,200 vintage cars. WHEN: Saturday – Sunday, September 19-20, 2015
WHERE: Naval Air Station North Island, Coronado, CA
COST: $25 one day and $35 for both days, in advance.
Tickets will also be available at the venue ( $35 one day and $45 for both days). Children 12 and under are FREE with paid adult admission. Active duty military and their direct dependents are FREE with ID.
About Coronado Speed Festival and Fleet Week San Diego
The Coronado Speed Festival is Fleet Week San Diego's preeminent event featuring fast-paced, thrilling auto racing and exhibitions for car enthusiasts of all ages. Staged at one of racings' most distinctive locations – Naval Air Station North Island, the birthplace of Naval Aviation – it's the only place to see live racing on an active U.S. Navy runway. Proceeds for the event benefit the San Diego Fleet Week Foundation and the Navy Morale, Welfare & Recreation (MWR) program.
Find Coronado Speed Festival at www.facebook.com/coronadospeedfestival or follow us on Twitter at www.twitter.com/SpeedFestSD .
About SVRA
The Sportscar Vintage Racing Association is the premier vintage racing organization in the United States . Founded in 1981 by Ford Heacock III, the SVRA has 2,000 members. It currently sanctions 14 events at some of the finest racing venues in the United States , including: Indianapolis Motor Speedway, Sebring, Road America, Watkins Glen , Auto Club Speedway, Road Atlanta, Pocono Raceway, the Mid-Ohio Sports Car Course, Sonoma Raceway, Portland International Raceway and Virginia International Raceway. The rapidly growing organization also hosted the first U.S. Vintage Racing National Championships in 2013 at Circuit of the Americas in Austin, Texas .
Further information on SVRA can be found on our website, www.svra.com , on Facebook, https://www.facebook.com/sportscarvintageracing , and on YouTube, https://www.youtube.com/user/SVRAcom , featuring more than 70 action packed videos of SVRA events.
Contact: Elisabeth Handley
Phone: (619) 997-0771
Email: elisabeth@fleetweeksandiego.org
